label: 9. ICCA government recognition status
helperText: Is the ICCA recognised by the national government for its role in conservation (e.g. as a protected area)? Select 'Designated' if the ICCA is legally-designated as a protected area or other type of conservation area. Select 'Established' if the ICCA is established by the indigenous people or local community, but not legally-designated as a protected area or other type of conservation area. Select 'Proposed' if the ICCA is approved for future legal-designation as a protected area or other type of conservation area
